p: For the CV assay, cells were stained with 0.05% crystal violet (Sigma-Aldrich) in 30% methanol for 20 minutes at room temperature. After incubation, the staining solution was removed. The cells were washed 4 times with water. For dye solubilization, 200 μl of a solubilizing solution (0.1 M citrate buffer, pH 4.2 in 50% ethanol; 1 : 1 v/ v) was added. The absorbance of the solution was measured using a Tecan Infinite M1000 multiplate spectrophotometer at a wavelength of 570 nm [ 21].
